duties_responsibilities.duty: Utilize data analytics and forecasting to optimize transportation capacity and efficiency.
Effective communication with international transportation partners and stakeholders.
Conduct in-depth logistics and transportation analysis to support business decisions.
Drive continuous improvement in transportation operations through data-driven insights.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to solve transportation-related challenges.
Maintain a high level of attention to detail in all transportation analysis and planning.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Logistics, Transportation, or related field (Master's preferred)
